page.title: 05Religion
page.content: There are a number of churches in the survey block. Most of the churches can be found in{Desborough}and these are the{Baptist Church, St. Giles}and the{ {United Reformed Church}which cater for the major religous faiths. In{Rushton}there is one church, it is called the{All Saints,}which plays an important part in the life of the community. Originally services in the{Baptist {Church }were held in {Braybrook}but as more people attended a new church was built in {Desborough.} When the church was less well off it sold its {Sunday School}but now hopes to buy it back. The minister fears vandalism in the church and would like to see a policeman on the beat all the time. The spire of {St Giles}church has been struck by lightining twice.
